item.description:
Hartford Heights Tall Club
8th Annual Cowboy Bar-B-Q

Date: Saturday, June 20, 2009

Time: High Noon ‘til half past dark

Place: Northwest Park, Windsor, CT

Grills fired up at 2 p.m. Grub to follow shortly.

Menu:
Steak
Baked Potato
Salad
Vegetable
Strawberry “Tallcake”
and Brownies
Iced Tea & Lemonade

Bring your own:
Soda or ‘other libations’
Lawn Chair
Volleyball Gear
Sunscreen

Activities:
Volleyball
Hiking
Cow Tipping (bocce)


Cost: $25 per person
RSVP by June 8th
Contact Sharon at 860-530-1540
If you cancel your reservation at the last minute, you will still owe us payment for steaks purchased!

All Proceeds will benefit HHTC Scholarship Fund

See flyer in Folders section
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be set up in the Warming Shed
item.name: Y'all Tall Steak Out
